verses.verse: Now <S%H3503>Jethro<s%>, the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H8085>heard<s%> of all that <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, how that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> he had sent her <S%H7964>away<s%>,

and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>; of whom the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>; for he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have been a <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> in a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>:

and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> was <S%H461>Eliezer<s%>; for he <S%H430>said<s%>, The God of my <S%H1>father<s%> was my <S%H5828>help<s%>, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> where he was <S%H2583>encamped<s%>, at the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>:

and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H2859>I<s%>, thy father-in-law <S%H3503>Jethro<s%>, am <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H802>thee<s%>, and thy wife, and her <S%H8147>two<s%> sons with <S%H1121>her<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, and did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H7592>him<s%>; and they asked <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H7453>other<s%> of their <S%H7965>welfare<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H168>tent<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H182>sake<s%>, all the <S%H8513>travail<s%> that had <S%H4672>come<s%> upon them by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and how <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> delivered <S%H5337>them<s%>.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H2302>rejoiced<s%> for all the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in that he had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; who hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.
Now I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> than all <S%H430>gods<s%>; <S%H1697>yea<s%>, in the thing wherein they dealt proudly against <S%H2102>them<s%>.

And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> about <S%H4872>Moses<s%> from the <S%H1242>morning<s%> unto the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H7200>saw<s%> all that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, What is this <S%H1697>thing<s%> that thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>? why <S%H3427>sittest<s%> thou thyself <S%H5971>alone<s%>, and all the people <S%H5324>stand<s%> about thee from <S%H1242>morning<s%> unto <S%H6153>even<s%>?
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, Because the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto me to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>:

when they have a <S%H1697>matter<s%>, they <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H8199>me<s%>; and I judge between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and I make them <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and his <S%H8451>laws<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1697>him<s%>, The thing that thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%>.

Thou wilt <S%H5034>surely<s%> wear <S%H5034>away<s%>, both <S%H5971>thou<s%>, and this people that is with <S%H1697>thee<s%>: for the thing is too <S%H3515>heavy<s%> for <S%H3201>thee<s%>; thou art not able to perform it thyself <S%H6213>alone<s%>.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> now unto my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, I will give thee <S%H3289>counsel<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> with <S%H5971>thee<s%>: be thou for the people to <S%H4136>Godward<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> thou the <S%H1697>causes<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>:

and thou shalt <S%H2094>teach<s%> them the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H8451>laws<s%>, and shalt <S%H3045>show<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%> wherein they must <S%H3212>walk<s%>, and the <S%H4639>work<s%> that they must <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Moreover thou shalt <S%H2372>provide<s%> out of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, such as <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>, <S%H8130>hating<s%> unjust <S%H1215>gain<s%>; and <S%H7760>place<s%> such over <S%H8269>them<s%>, to be rulers of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%>, and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H6235>tens<s%>:

and let them <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at all <S%H6256>seasons<s%>: and it shall <S%H1419>be<s%>, that every great <S%H1697>matter<s%> they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> unto <S%H6996>thee<s%>, but every small <S%H1697>matter<s%> they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H7043>themselves<s%>: so shall it be easier for <S%H5375>thyself<s%>, and they shall bear the burden with thee.

If thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee <S%H3201>so<s%>, then thou shalt be able to <S%H5975>endure<s%>, and all this <S%H5971>people<s%> also shall <S%H935>go<s%> to their <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, and <S%H6213>did<s%> all that he had <S%H559>said<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> out of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%>, and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of <S%H6235>tens<s%>.

And they <S%H8199>judged<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> at all <S%H6256>seasons<s%>: the <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H1697>causes<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, but every <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H1697>matter<s%> they judged <S%H8199>themselves<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> let his <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law <S%H7971>depart<s%>; and he <S%H3212>went<s%> his way into his own <S%H776>land<s%>.
